name: Lily Amaryllis
skill: Deals 2417/3077 DMG to current target with a moderate/high chance of inflicting Weak Poison.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a hurricane lily recognizeable for her red bulbs atop a leafless stem. Her beauty straddles the line between stuning and violent, lending her appearance a heavenly or hellish bent, depending on the mindset of the beholder. Either interpretation suits her just fine as she stands stock still, serene and at one with here surroundings.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Acquired at the Beginning of the Game
◦ Jewel Summon

skill: "I shall sprinkle you with misfortune's seeds"
summon: "Would you care to join me in prayer?"
limit_break: "Pray, and flutter quietly to the ground..."
